entry.title: Carbon Certificates
entry.summary: There is no distinction between reducing emissions with 1 tCO2e vs a removing 1 tCO2e from the atmosphere. Carbon carbon removal is more important and more difficult. They require technology. The best technology for carbon removal projects is nature - reforesting mangrove habitats, planting hemp,…
entry.content:
There is no distinction between reducing emissions with 1 tCO2e vs a removing 1 tCO2e from the atmosphere.

Carbon carbon removal is more important and more difficult. They require technology. The best technology for carbon removal projects is nature - reforesting mangrove habitats, planting hemp, etc.

That's why we created a Carbon Removal Certification Program.

CERTIFICATION

Providing legitimacy, trading liquidity and funding opportunities to carbon removal projects.

Carbon Removal projects are strenuous for suppliers to deliver. They are scarce and overlooked because of their relative difficulty.

Our certification methodology is being developed with transparency, accuracy and the latest technologies, with a global registry on the blockchain.

We offer project developers or farmers project and land tracking via their phone, including land use rights, project documentation, detailed budget, independent third party validation by an accredited auditor (such as Tüv for example).

Buyers has access to the aggregated data, IoT metrics, satellite and drone imagery.

entry.title: The Problem With Current Carbon Credit Solutions
entry.summary: Demand for carbon credits has been increasing year-over-year as more than 1600 companies have committed to Net Zero, of which 20% are part of the 2000 largest companies worldwide, with a $14T market cap. If you add to that the fact that 1.6 GtCO2e residual…
entry.content:
Demand for carbon credits has been increasing year-over-year as more than 1600 companies have committed to Net Zero, of which 20% are part of the 2000 largest companies worldwide, with a $14T market cap.

If you add to that the fact that 1.6 GtCO2e residual emissions need to be removed from the atmosphere, you would think that there is a plan and that there are some great solutions out there for us to get there.

The reality could not be further from the truth, here is why.

The current solutions for carbon credits are focused on offsetting over removal.

When it comes to reaching net zero, one major issue is that carbon removal is sometimes mistaken or conflated with carbon offsetting. In actuality, carbon offsetting and carbon removal provide two very distinct outcomes. When one metric tonne of CO2 is emitted, another metric tonne of CO2 is prevented somewhere else, resulting in a net increase in CO2 emissions. When one metric tonne of CO2 is released, one metric tonne is totally removed from the atmosphere by carbon removal.

According to the Taskforce on Scaling Voluntary Carbon Markets, 2 gigatons of carbon reduction is required by 2030. To achieve this we will need a 15-fold increase from 2019 figures in volunteer effort by 2030. Making it a compelling case for increasing carbon removal.

The certification process lacks accuracy, transparency and accountability.

The fact that there is no formal international standard for carbon offset accounting is at the foundation of most of the difficulty. Instead, commercial organisations such as Gold Standard, Verra, and the American Carbon Registry calculate, certify, and broker offsets using a mix of methodologies in each part of the process.

A research paper published in 2021 examined 100 offsets certified by Gold Standard and other organisations. Offsets from projects supporting forest conservation, climate-friendly farming, direct air capture technology, and other methods for reducing emissions. They discovered that 90% of the offsets either didn't offset as much as they claimed, aren't permanent, had negative consequences for local populations or ecosystems, or were a mix of the above.

Bonus reason: current solutions are still building with web 2.0 methods.
There is an opportunity to use the power of blockchain to make the exchange of carbon credits more efficient and transparent. That is why CARBEXC plans to combine DEFI, NFTs and the current carbon credit markets to make it easier to trade and burn carbon credits.

If you want to be one of the first few to have access to our platform join our waitlist.

entry.title: Why the world needs CARBEXC?
entry.summary: Here are a few reasons why we believe that the world needs a solution like CARBEXC. The demand for carbon neutrality and Net-Zero solutions is exploding. Within the last two years, companies with accumulated annual revenue of +$10T have pledged carbon Net-Zero by 2040 -…
entry.content:
Here are a few reasons why we believe that the world needs a solution like CARBEXC.

The demand for carbon neutrality and Net-Zero solutions is exploding.

Within the last two years, companies with accumulated annual revenue of +$10T have pledged carbon Net-Zero by 2040 - e.g. Alibaba, Amazon, Microsoft, Reckitt, Infosys, Siemens, Unilever, Coca Cola, Heineken, IBM, IPG, Snap Inc, ASOS, Salesforce, P&G, Accenture, Palo Networks, WPP, Klarna, Deloitte, Mercedes, Visa, Pepsico, Canva, Verizon, Uber to name a few of the 217+.

Carbon credits will conservatively become a $160 billion market opportunity according to Marin Katusa, Founder of Katusa Research, Fund Manager, best-selling author and world-renowned speculator.

Governments are enforcing climate change actions.

The European Climate Law (July 2021) set a legally binding target of Net-Zero greenhouse gas emissions by 2050. The EU Institutions and the Member States are bound to take the necessary measures at EU and national level to meet the target (European Commision 2021). The US is initiating similar steps (The White House, January 2021). China pledged to become carbon neutral before 2060 and boosted their pledge from 20% energy from renewables to 25% by 2030 (Reuters, October 2021). India pledged Net-Zero carbon emissions by 2070 and their intentions of getting half its electricity from renewable sources by 2030 (BBC, November 2021). And we’re only at the beginning.

The competing solutions for contributing towards carbon solutions are limited.

Climate tech VC investments have increased 5x from 2016 to 2021 to only $32B (Dealroom, Oct 2021). However, the current certification programs, supply and exchanges are not able to fulfil the demand of the market. 

Those are a few reasons why we believe CARBEXC can be a game changer for this market and the world. If you want to join us on our mission and be one of the first few to have access to our platform join our waitlist here.

entry.content:

  1. Sign up: For your account and create your wallet
    1. Simply with passport and selfie. 
    2. No credit card required. 
  2. Buy: Carbon Credit spots and futures

    2. Easy credit card or crypto checkout
  3. Share: Your carbon Net-Zero pledge
    1. Share your results with your NFT certificates
    2. Motivate action around the world by leading the way

entry.title: The Source Code
entry.summary: The Source Code is an incubator and accelerators that aims to be the conscious digital backbone for humanity. Our focus is on solving three major global issues: CLIMATE CHANGE Our planet is our only home. To take care of it is our utmost priority. Failing…
entry.content:
The Source Code is an incubator and accelerators that aims to be the conscious digital backbone for humanity. Our focus is on solving three major global issues:

CLIMATE CHANGE
Our planet is our only home.  To take care of it is our utmost priority.  Failing to do so will end in catastrophe.

THE INTERNET IS BROKEN
We have become products for unsustainable,  unsecure and unreliable internet monopolies that steal our sovereignty.

EDUCATION
If we all had equal access to the same information and knowledge, those left behind would progress much faster.

To learn more about The Source Code click here [ADD LINK TO WEBSITE]

entry.title: Carbon Forwards
entry.summary: Carbon Forwards is a visionary new asset class for the Voluntary Carbon Markets (VCM), that enable companies to buy carbon credits of future carbon removal projects. Our focus on carbon removal projects is to increase the impact we have on slowing down climate change. To…
entry.content:
Carbon Forwards is a visionary new asset class for the Voluntary Carbon Markets (VCM), that enable companies to buy carbon credits of future carbon removal projects. Our focus on carbon removal projects is to increase the impact we have on slowing down climate change.

To create Carbon Forwards CARBEXC has developed partnerships and is developing a unique certification process that involves satellite imagery, drones and IoT devices to track the projects.

Providing ROI while funding carbon removal projects.

Buy, sell and trade carbon credit futures and help organizations making an impact towards the betterment of our planet and our species with high impact nature-based solutions.

Not just reducing carbon emissions. No - that’s cutting corners and isn’t enough. We catalyze carbon removal projects, to remove carbon out of the atmosphere for 2x impact.

PARTNERSHIPS
We are partnering with leaders of carbon removal projects and are always looking for new partners.

Mangroves Blue Carbon with Vlinder

Mangrove forests sequester up to five times more carbon dioxide from the atmosphere than other types of forest.

 

Hemp Green Carbon with Signara Global Solutions


Hemp is one of the fastest converting CO2-to-biomass tools available today; proved more efficient than agro-forestry (European Industrial Hemp Association)

 

Educating Children with Take Action Global


Over two million children are earning carbon credits by learning and then teaching about harvesting carbon.

 

Are you a potential supplier of carbon credits.

Join Our Waitlist

entry.title: Carbon Exchange
entry.summary: A Carbon Credit Exchange solution with a digital wallet, carbon credit tokens and a marketplace webshop. Since day one our missions has been to use the power of Decentralized Finance (DEFI) to empower everyone to save our planet. 1 - Trustworthy 2 - Easy…
entry.content:
A Carbon Credit Exchange solution with a digital wallet, carbon credit tokens and a marketplace webshop. 

Since day one our missions has been to use the power of Decentralized Finance (DEFI) to empower everyone to save our planet.

1 - Trustworthy

  • Tokenized carbon credits
  • Blockchain-based settlement
  • Non-custodial mobile wallet and client side bidding

2 - Easy and accessible

  • Fast credit card checkout
  • Instant settlement
  • Transferable & tradable digital token

3 - Quality and Impact

  • CARBEXC certified carbon credit forwards
  • All VCS-certified carbon credits
  • Carbon credit offset on demand

Exchange Platform

Our simple exchange interface allows anyone to easily understand and participate in the exchange of carbon credits and futures.

Digital Wallet

Store all your carbon credits or forwards on our non-custodial digital wallet.

Marketplace Webshop

Discover new carbon removal projects without having to understand anything about crypto or blockchain and check-out using Credit card, Apple Pay, SEPA or SWIFT.
